results.title: Primary media studies
results.creator_credit: Stephen Skok, Film Media Studies and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
results.brief_description: Indicates various types of activities that could be included in a primary media studies course. Shows hand drawing on film, making storyboards, exercises in persistence of vision, stimuli for creative writing, drama with video and script development.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Skok, Film Media Studies and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
results.description: Indicates various types of activities that could be included in a primary media studies course. Shows hand drawing on film, making storyboards, exercises in persistence of vision, stimuli for creative writing, drama with video and script development.

results.title: Adventures in the Strait
results.creator_credit: Sorogo Mills, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The rope that linked the dinghy to the boat had snapped. It was up to me to fix it. Sorogo’s story about an experience that showed him what he was really made of.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sorogo Mills, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: The rope that linked the dinghy to the boat had snapped. It was up to me to fix it. Sorogo’s story about an experience that showed him what he was really made of.

results.title: Behind the scenes
results.creator_credit: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Six Indigenous Youth Leadership Programme scholars were invited to participate in a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI in June 2007. Here is a glimpse behind the scenes of the workshop and interviews with the participants on their experience.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tim Kanoa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Six Indigenous Youth Leadership Programme scholars were invited to participate in a Digital Storytelling workshop at ACMI in June 2007. Here is a glimpse behind the scenes of the workshop and interviews with the participants on their experience.

results.title: This is a story about the land we live on
results.creator_credit: Alisha Dark, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: This land has cared for our ancestors for generations and now it’s our turn to care for it. We need to take responsibility. This story is about Alisha’s personal connection with the land.
results.title_for_label: This is a story about the land we live on
results.creator_credit_for_label: Alisha Dark, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: The Dam builders
results.creator_credit: Cine Service and Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works
results.brief_description: Gives a brief history of the Melbourne water supply system and the efforts of the MMBW to create enjoyable environments such as landscaping and recreation facilities in several catchment areas. Highlights the construction of the Cardinia Reservoir, near Emerald, now the largest storage area for Melbourne.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Cine Service and Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works
results.description: Gives a brief history of the Melbourne water supply system and the efforts of the MMBW to create enjoyable environments such as landscaping and recreation facilities in several catchment areas. Highlights the construction of the Cardinia Reservoir, near Emerald, now the largest storage area for Melbourne.
description_for_label: Gives a brief history of the Melbourne water supply system and the efforts of the MMBW to create enjoyable environments such as landscaping and recreation facilities in several catchment areas. Highlights the construction of the Cardinia Reservoir, near Emerald, now the largest storage area for Melbourne.

results.title: From me to Uncle Geoff
results.brief_description: Tim Stares pays tribute to his uncle Geoff who died one month before Tim was born. This digital story was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray 'Tongola'
results.creator_credit: George Nelson and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
results.title_for_label: Yorta Yorta: the river people of the Murray ‘Tongola’
results.description: Yorta Yorta descendant, George Nelson, talks about his great grandfather, Thomas James or as he was more fondly known as, grandpa james. An interesting history of Echuca, missionary life and Aboriginal culture and identity.
